body_html: @girving Yes, I think we should be escaping strings here. I don't remember what the outcome of the earlier discussion was (in particular, where the encoding should happen) but it seems like we use str_util::CEscape(binary_string) in a few kernels, so perhaps we should use it here?
body_text: @girving Yes, I think we should be escaping strings here. I don't remember what the outcome of the earlier discussion was (in particular, where the encoding should happen) but it seems like we use str_util::CEscape(binary_string) in a few kernels, so perhaps we should use it here?
body: @girving Yes, I think we should be escaping strings here. I don't remember what the outcome of the earlier discussion was (in particular, where the encoding should happen) but it seems like we use `str_util::CEscape(binary_string)` in a few kernels, so perhaps we should use it here?
